adventuregame.npc module¶

class npc.ItemTrader¶

Bases: npc.Trader

Trader that trades Health Potions.

class npc.Npc(name, hp)¶

Bases: object

Superclass for all NPCs in the game.

The name of the NPC.

Type

str

hp¶

Health Points of the NPC.

Type

str
